sentence:
Journals were excluded from this systematised review if no full-text versions of their articles were available, if journals explicitly stated a publication preference for certain research methods, or if the journal only published articles in a specific discipline of psychological research (for example, industrial psychology, clinical psychology etc.).Procedure
The researchers followed a procedure (see Figure 1) adapted from that of Ferreira et al. (2016) for systematised reviews.
Inclusion and exclusion criteria resulted in a final sample of 999 articles (Figure 2).
